scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin portfolio.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/portfolio.html && usemin blog.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/blog.html && usemin ristorante.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/ristorante.html && usemin pong.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/pong.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
